statements: SELECT * FROM gaming_accessory_orders;
SELECT accessory_name, order_date FROM gaming_accessory_orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT order_id, accessory_name, order_date FROM gaming_accessory_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessory_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT accessory_name, delivery_address FROM gaming_accessory_orders WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY delivery_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessory_orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT accessory_name, order_date FROM gaming_accessory_orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' AND order_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT accessory_name, delivery_address FROM gaming_accessory_orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending'
SELECT order_id, accessory_name, order_date, delivery_address FROM gaming_accessory_orders ORDER BY accessory_name ASC, order_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders, AVG(order_id) AS avg_order_id FROM gaming_accessory_orders
SELECT * FROM shipping_orders;
SELECT accessory_name, delivery_address FROM shipping_orders;
SELECT order_id, accessory_name, order_date FROM shipping_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_person, status FROM delivery_status WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, delivery_address, delivery_date, delivery_person FROM shipping_orders JOIN delivery_status ON shipping_orders.order_id = delivery_status.order_id;
SELECT * FROM shipping_orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT accessory_name, delivery_address FROM shipping_orders WHERE order_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, accessory_name, delivery_address, order_date FROM shipping_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY order_id ASC;

SELECT order_id, accessory_name, delivery_person FROM shipping_orders JOIN delivery_status ON shipping_orders.order_id = delivery_status.order_id WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;

SELECT delivery_address, status, delivery_date, delivery_person FROM shipping_orders JOIN delivery_status ON shipping_orders.order_id = delivery_status.order_id WHERE order_id = 105 AND delivery_person LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM AccessoryOrders;
SELECT order_id, product_name, customer_name FROM AccessoryOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccessoryOrders WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM AccessoryOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM ShippingCompanies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM AccessoryOrders WHERE order_id > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_name, customer_name, order_date FROM AccessoryOrders WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM AccessoryOrders JOIN DeliveryStatusLog ON AccessoryOrders.order_id = DeliveryStatusLog.order_id WHERE DeliveryStatusLog.status = 'Delivered'
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM AccessoryOrders WHERE delivery_status IN ('Shipped', 'In Transit')
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM AccessoryOrders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM shipping_orders;
SELECT order_id, accessory_name, customer_id FROM shipping_orders WHERE delivery_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM accessories ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN shipping_orders ON customers.customer_id = shipping_orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM shipping_orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_status FROM shipping_orders WHERE delivery_status='pending';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT shipment.order_id, accessory_name, quantity, price FROM shipping_orders AS shipment JOIN order_details AS details ON shipment.order_id = details.order_id JOIN accessories AS acc ON details.accessory_id = acc.accessory_id ORDER BY shipment.order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT tracking_id, shipment_id, status FROM tracking_status WHERE status = 'Shipping'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE description LIKE '%electronics%'
SELECT shipment_id, shipping_date, delivery_date FROM shipments WHERE shipping_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC
